trans-unit.source: If a production order is created using multilevel production, the scheduling for each production step is independent from each other if the starting or ending date is changed manually after the production order was calculated.

seg-source.mrk: If a production order is created using multilevel production, the scheduling for each production step is independent from each other if the starting or ending date is changed manually after the production order was calculated.

trans-unit.source: : Released production order with Update Multilevel Production Order functionality

seg-source.mrk: : Released production order with Update Multilevel Production Order functionality

trans-unit.source: As <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref286332708" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 1</MadCap:xref> illustrates, item P-10502 must be produced first to be bottled in a second production step in the item P-10502-F200. The production line P-10502 has been scheduled and is finished at the same time the bottling item is starting to be produced.

seg-source.mrk: As <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref286332708" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 1</MadCap:xref> illustrates, item P-10502 must be produced first to be bottled in a second production step in the item P-10502-F200.
The production line P-10502 has been scheduled and is finished at the same time the bottling item is starting to be produced.

trans-unit.source: The setup of the scheduling using multilevel productions is configured in the Planning Extension Setup page.

seg-source.mrk: The setup of the scheduling using multilevel productions is configured in the Planning Extension Setup page.

trans-unit.source: : Update Multilevel Production Order functionality setup

seg-source.mrk: : Update Multilevel Production Order functionality setup

trans-unit.source: If the Update Multilevel Prod. Orders check box is selected and the Starting or Ending Date-Time is changed on a production order line, the following result is achieved.

seg-source.mrk: Orders check box is selected and the Starting or Ending Date-Time is changed on a production order line, the following result is achieved.

trans-unit.source: : Recalculated production order with Update Multilevel Production Order functionality

seg-source.mrk: : Recalculated production order with Update Multilevel Production Order functionality

trans-unit.source: In the above example, the Starting Date-Time on the first line was changed to 1/28/2019. The Starting Date-Time and Ending Date-Time in the lower production line were recalculated and remain linked to the Starting-Date Time on the first line.

seg-source.mrk: In the above example, the Starting Date-Time on the first line was changed to 1/28/2019.
The Starting Date-Time and Ending Date-Time in the lower production line were recalculated and remain linked to the Starting-Date Time on the first line.

trans-unit.source: In the next example, a production order is created for the same item and quantity, but the Update Multilevel Prod. Orders check box is not selected on the Planning Extension Setup page.

seg-source.mrk: In the next example, a production order is created for the same item and quantity, but the <span class="Bold">Update Multilevel Prod.
Orders check box is not selected on the Planning Extension Setup page.

trans-unit.source: : Update Multilevel Production Order functionality setup

seg-source.mrk: : Update Multilevel Production Order functionality setup

trans-unit.source: : Released production order without Update Multilevel Production Order functionality

seg-source.mrk: : Released production order without Update Multilevel Production Order functionality

trans-unit.source: The Starting Date-Time on the first line is changed to 1/29/2019. The Ending Date-Time in the lower production line does not change and there is no longer a link to the production of the bottling item.

seg-source.mrk: The Starting Date-Time on the first line is changed to 1/29/2019.
The Ending Date-Time in the lower production line does not change and there is no longer a link to the production of the bottling item.

trans-unit.source: : Recalculated production order without Update Multilevel Production Order functionality

seg-source.mrk: : Recalculated production order without Update Multilevel Production Order functionality
